aircraft.name: Boeing 737
funFacts: Most popular commercial jet ever made
One takes off or lands every 2 seconds somewhere in the world
Has been flying since 1967

aircraft.name: Airbus A320
funFacts: First commercial jet with fly-by-wire controls
Uses joysticks instead of traditional yokes
Most popular Airbus aircraft

aircraft.name: Boeing 777
funFacts: Largest twin-engine jet in the world
Can fly halfway around the world nonstop
First Boeing designed entirely on computers

aircraft.name: Airbus A350
funFacts: Made with 53% composite materials
Wings can bend up to 5 meters
Quietest wide-body aircraft

aircraft.name: Boeing 787 Dreamliner
funFacts: Windows are 65% larger than other jets
No window shades - uses electronic dimming
Cabin pressure feels like 6,000ft instead of 8,000ft

aircraft.name: Airbus A380
funFacts: Largest passenger aircraft in the world
Has two full decks
Wingspan is almost as long as a football field

aircraft.name: Boeing 747
funFacts: Known as the 'Queen of the Skies'
Has a distinctive hump for the upper deck
Was the largest passenger jet for 37 years

aircraft.name: Embraer E190
funFacts: Popular regional jet
No middle seats - 2x2 configuration
Very quiet for its size

aircraft.name: CRJ-900
funFacts: Common on shorter routes
Can use smaller airports
Very fuel efficient
